foodItems.description: A classic burger with a juicy patty, fresh lettuce, tomato, and your choice of toppings, served on a soft bun.
Delicious pasta cooked to perfection and served with your choice of sauce, garnished with grated cheese.
A mouthwatering pizza topped with a variety of fresh ingredients and melted cheese on a crispy crust.
A healthy and refreshing salad made with crisp lettuce, assorted veggies, and your choice of dressing.
A delectable sandwich filled with a combination of meats, cheeses, and fresh vegetables, served on your choice of bread.
A succulent steak, perfectly grilled to your liking, served with a side of vegetables and sauce.
Exquisite sushi rolls with a variety of fresh seafood and vegetables, accompanied by soy sauce and wasabi.
Tasty tacos filled with your choice of meat, salsa, and toppings, wrapped in soft tortillas.
Sweet and fluffy waffles served with a variety of toppings, such as syrup, whipped cream, and fruits.
